lines.gurmukhi: eyeI AKIAwN ju pyiK pRQm AnUp rUp kwmnw pUrn kir shj smwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ayee Akheeaan Ju Paykhi Pradam Anoop Roopa , Kaamanaa Pooran Kari Sahaj Samaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: These are the very eyes which used to see the extremely beautiful form of the beloved Lord and satisfying their desire would absorb themselves in the spiritual bliss.

lines.gurmukhi: eyeI AKIAwN ju lIlw lwln kI iek tk Aiq Ascrj hÍY hyrq ihrwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ayee Akheeaan Ju Leelaa Laalan Kee Ik Taka , Ati Asacharaj Hvai Hayrat Hiraanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: These are the eyes that used to go into raptures of bliss seeing the divine wonders of the dear Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: eyeI AKIAwN ju ibCurq piRX pRwnpiq ibrh ibXog rog pIrw kY iprwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Ayee Akheeaan Ju Bichhurat Priy Praanapati , Birah Biyog Rog Peeraa Kai Piraanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: These are the eyes that used to suffer the most at the time of separation of the Lord, the Master of my life.

lines.gurmukhi: nwskw sÍn rsnw mY AgRBwg huqI eyeI AKIAwN sgl AMg mYN ibrwnI hY ]669]
lines.transliteration_english: Naasakaa Sravan Rasanaa Mai Agrabhaag Houtee , Ayee Akheeaan Sagal Ang Main Biraanee Hai ?669?

Shabad OS B.translation: To fulfill the loving relationship with the beloved, these eyes that used to be ahead of all other parts of my body like nose, ears, tongue etc. are now behaving like stranger over all of them. (Being bereft of beloved Lord's glimpse and His wondrous deed
